kesako.watcher.runnable

Class MetaFileProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • kesako.watcher.runnable.IntervalDBWork
      • kesako.watcher.runnable.MetaFileProcess
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MetaFileProcess
extends IntervalDBWork
    Update the file meta-data by reading the meta-data file < filename >.meta
    The class implements the Log4J logging system.
    Author:
    Frederic SACHOT

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void doWork()
      Do the meta-data process.
      private void getIndexMeta(java.lang.String fileURI)
      Recover the meta-data of the file fileURI from the index.
      private void metaProcessing(java.sql.Connection cn, int idFichier)
      Recover the meta-data of the file from the meta-file
      First step: all meta-data of the file are suppress from the data-base,
      Second step: meta-data are recovered from the index with getIndexMeta
      Third step: if the file has a meta-file, the meta-data are recovered from the meta-file.

    • Method Detail

      • getIndexMeta

        private void getIndexMeta(java.lang.String fileURI)
                   throws org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException
        Recover the meta-data of the file fileURI from the index.
        Parameters:
        fileURI -
        Throws:

      • metaProcessing

        private void metaProcessing(java.sql.Connection cn,
                  int idFichier)
                     throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                            org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                            java.io.IOException,
                            java.text.ParseException,
                            org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException
        Recover the meta-data of the file from the meta-file
        First step: all meta-data of the file are suppress from the data-base,
        Second step: meta-data are recovered from the index with getIndexMeta
        Third step: if the file has a meta-file, the meta-data are recovered from the meta-file. Final step: the meta-data are saved in the data-base and the file is marked to be reindexing.
        Parameters:
        file -
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        java.io.IOException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.text.ParseException
        org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException

      • doWork

        Do the meta-data process.

        doWork in class IntervalDBWork
